definition: Yangshuo county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
beginning/first day of lunar month/north
Yangshuo county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi

sentences.english: If you have been to Yangshuo, you must have been surprised by its green mountains and clear rivers.
sentences.chinese: 如果你曾经去过阳朔，你一定惊讶于那里青山碧水。

sentences.english: Yangshuo lies in the northeast of Guangxi Province and to the southeast of Guilin City.
sentences.chinese: 阳朔坐落于广西省东北部，在桂林的东南面。

sentences.english: Last month, I went to Guilin and Yangshuo by train for my holiday.
sentences.chinese: 上个月放假自己坐火车去了一趟桂林和阳朔游玩。

sentences.english: Yangshuo can also take the most popular tourist car battery to West Street.
sentences.chinese: 也可乘坐阳朔最流行的电瓶观光车至西街。

sentences.english: I was really impressed with some of the routes that Abon had done in Yangshuo.
sentences.chinese: 阿邦在阳朔攀爬的一些线路让我印象非常深刻。

sentences.english: I want to see the Terra Cotta Warriors and the mountains of Yangshuo.
sentences.chinese: 我想去看看兵马俑和阳朔的山。

sentences.english: MCI School is a big part of our great fortune to be in Yangshuo.
sentences.chinese: 为美城工作是我在阳朔的一笔巨大财富收获。

sentences.english: If you have been here, did you still remember The Fawlty Towers Hotel?
sentences.chinese: 来过的朋友，您是否仍记得阳朔宝泉宾馆？

sentences.english: The most tempting place in Yanghuo is the Slabstone Street,which has gained a new name as “The Western Street”.
sentences.chinese: 阳朔最吸引人的地方就是板石街，又名“西洋街”。

sentences.english: Yangshuo, nestled on the banks of the Li River, is known for its spectacular limestone mountains.
sentences.chinese: 阳朔因其有壮观的石灰岩山脉而闻名于世。

sentences.english: The most attractive place in Yangshuo is, of course, the Slabstone Street, also known as "the Western Street".
sentences.chinese: 阳朔最吸引人的地方就是板石街，又名“西洋街”。

sentences.english: The facts are as follows: The woman, named Xie Lianfeng, lives in Jinyang Village, Yangshuo, Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 而事实是，这位家住广西阳朔金阳村的妇女叫谢莲凤。
这张照片是中国桂林阳朔漓江岸边的日出。

sentences.english: Round group Leader Mountain from the fishing village can hope to see Yangshuo.
sentences.chinese: 从渔村绕到龙头山就可以望见阳朔了。

sentences.english: There are now 600 registered guides in Yangshuo.
sentences.chinese: 仅阳朔本地就有正式导游600名。

sentences.english: As I cycled from Xing Ping back to Yangshuo, the warm wind whispered in my ears.
sentences.chinese: 当我骑车从兴坪返回阳朔时，暖风轻拂。
